title: North Atlantic Odyssey
description:
There is an adventurous streak in all of us. A desire to hit the pause button, pack up our bags, and ignite something in ourselves that we didn’t even know existed. We gave five intrepids that very chance… We sent the following five adventurers sailing to explore the North Atlantic and Equatorial Pacific. 

- Conor Smith: Graduate student / Sailor
- Daniel Caponetto: Sailing afficionado / Adventurer
- Alex Ayling: Travel vlogger
- Ariel Tweto: Alaskan Bush Pilot
- Christina Caradona: Model / Fashionista

To see more Odysseys, visit sperry.com

Shop Sperry: http://sperry.com
Instagram: https://instagram.com/sperry
Snapchat: @sperry
Facebook: https://facebook.com/sperry
